com.tek.interview.question.ordercalculation.impl

Class SalesCalculatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tek.interview.question.ordercalculation.impl.SalesCalculatorUtils

  • public final class SalesCalculatorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Tax utility class used for calculating tax of item/s.
    Author:
    Steve Whitmire (swhit114@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTaxUSD

        public static double calculateTaxUSD(double unitPrice,
                                     double taxRateDecimal)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the tax amount of one item in USD.
        Parameters:
        unitPrice - The price of one unit in USD.
        taxRateDecimal - The tax rate in decimal format as a double (between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive).
        Returns:
        Returns the tax amount of one item in USD as a double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws if unitPrice or quantity are less than 0 or if taxRateDecimal is not between 0 and 1(inclusive).

      • calculateTaxUSD

        public static double calculateTaxUSD(double unitPrice,
                                     int quantity,
                                     double taxRateDecimal)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the tax amount of one item in USD. Precision is set to 2 decimal places.
        Parameters:
        unitPrice - The price of one unit in USD.
        quantity - The number of units that are to be included in the tax calculation.
        taxRateDecimal - The tax rate in decimal format as a double (between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive).
        Returns:
        Returns the tax amount of one item in USD as a double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws if unitPrice or quantity are less than 0 or if taxRateDecimal is not between 0 and 1(inclusive).

      • roundToTwoDecimalPlaces

        public static double roundToTwoDecimalPlaces(double valueToRound)
        Rounds the supplied value to two decimal places.
        Parameters:
        valueToRound - The value that needs to be rounded.
        Returns:
        Returns the valueToRound rounded to two decimal places, as a double.
